description: Some of Europe's leaders stand accused of taking advantage of a health crisis.
title: Coronavirus: Is pandemic being used for power grab in Europe?
title_page: Coronavirus: Is pandemic being used for power grab in Europe? - BBC News
maintext: Covid-19, though, has put everything on hold. President Putin has had to postpone the ballot: after all, how can you call people to come out and vote in the middle of a pandemic? The Kremlin's problem now is that, if and when the ballot does take place, endorsing a new Constitution may well be the last thing on Russian minds.
